name: Gladius
body:
## 3.0.2 Release
- Fixed a bug which created invisible but clickable frames outside arenas.
- Disabled test button functionality inside arenas.
- Fixed a type which didn't let "Layouts" module to load properly.
- xCT and xCT+ support fix.
- Library updates.
- Some other smaller fixes.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Release
- Tagging as release.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 6
- Added zhCN and zhTW localizations.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 5
- DRTracker fixes.
- Healthbar fixes.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 4
- Aura updates.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 3
- Lib updates.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 2
- Added support for xCT and xCT+.
- Added Korean localizations.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 1
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.0 Release
- Updated for 5.2.
- Spell updates.
- Library updates.
- Minor bug fixes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
